attributes.action: Referendum to change the goverment Immediately!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British people did not elect Gordon Brown to be the Prime minister and the people do not want him as Prime minister. 
The country needs to change as it's falling apart, to many Immigrants, nothing is being done about the crime and youth problems, and Green belt is going to be destroyed. Get the labour government out before they destroy what we have left of the British Society. 
I believe most of the above major issues are easy to solve and nothing is being done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
